Title: Public Private Partnership (PPP)
Description: A long-term contract between a private party and a government entity,for providing a public asset or service,in which the private party bears significant risk and management responsibility and remuneration is linked to performance.

Title: Private
Description: A contract in which the private sector takes ownership of the network and responsibility for its operation.

Title: Public
Description: A contract in which the public sector owns the network and is responsible for its operation.
